ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] RE: Gordon
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, Ok. ok, I ll fess up.  I went back to some of my very first characters - ones I dropped only after a few weeks or in some cases a few hours of playing.
ygData.messageBody:
Heh,

Ok. ok, I'll fess up. I went back to some of my very first characters -
ones I dropped only after a few weeks or in some cases a few hours of
playing. When I looked at their stats, I did a OMG!!! What was I
thinking???? Just for example, my hunam cleric has *alot* of charisma and
some added strength. Why? Well, when you are hauling all that loot back to
the merchants to get those extra good prices from the high charisma....
seemed like a good idea at the time when all you had to go on was what was
printed in the *stoopid* EQ user manual. Their character creation sections
(to this day) really do a bad job of helping people get started.

Sylly


Lyrnia wrote:

> >FYI: I've known him, in game, since Beta 2. He's a
> >nice guy, fun to hunt with and very knowledgeable

Then another bard sang:

> I mostly lurk here but I really feel that I do have to
> comment here. Remember Gordon is the guy who felt
> that putting points into strength for his necro was a
> valid character creation strategy..
